name: Claustrophobia (the walls are closing in)
description:
This is a short game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 42, using the theme "Running out of space". The walls will slowly and persistently creep up on you, and bugs wander around the ever-shrinking space. Fight back against both and try to survive for as long as you can. You might not last forever, but you can certainly try.

Controls: Aim with the mouse
Play time: About 2 minutes

(Note: Mac and Linux versions of the game are currently untested.)
